overview: Bomba decides to find out who his parents were. He starts with Cody Casson's diary and follows the trail to a native village. An ancient blind woman tells him his parents and the village's true ruler were murdered by the current chieftain and his daughter.
tagline: Savage darts and white man's bullets split the Congo...in frenzied search for monster-guarded secrets!
title: Bomba and the Jungle Girl
